charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute and distribution of methamphetamine; Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 846(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is sentenced to 36 months imprisonment; 4 years supervised release with conditions; pay a fine in the amount of $500.00 and pay a special assessment of $100.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute and distribution of methamphetamine; Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 846(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is sentenced to 30 months imprisonment; 4 years supervised release with conditions; pay a fine in the amount of $500.00 and pay a special assessment of $100.00
